message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product at a price of $13,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value.
I appreciate your time, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $13,000 is already a significant discount.  How about we meet in the middle at $12,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can we try $10,500?
